transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan sir, kis company se baat kar rahe ho aap?

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan sir, kis company se baat kar rahe hain aap?
Customer: Aap phone kyun nahi utha rahe hain hain?
Executive: Main?
Customer: Haan, haan. Hello.
Executive: Toh call toh utha raha hun sir.
Customer: Phone toh kaat hi rahe the aap.
Executive: Main phone kaat raha tha?
Customer: Bilkul. Abhi toh baat ho rahi hai.
Customer: Suno na.
Executive: Nahi sir.
Customer: Aap kisko call, kisko call, main sir IndiaMART se baat kar raha hun, Aadarsh account manager.
Customer: Sir, kaahe ka account manager ho bhai aap?
Executive: Kis company se baat kar rahe ho sir aap?
Customer: Aapko malum hi nahi hai? Jab account manager ho toh aapko malum hona chahiye na.
Executive: Save nahi hai number na sir.
Customer: Toh save karke rakho phir.

Executive: Sir virtual number hai.
Executive: Se bol raha hun main.
Customer: Achha aap se baat kar rahe ho.
Hmm. Achha sir, aapne feedback abhi diya hai no ka na sir?
Customer: Haan sir, woh actually kya hai ki aap jab tak GST verification karaoge nahi sir na, hamara bahut lamba mail threat chala, kaafi departments ke saath mein. Woh ek sir blocker lag gaya aapke account pe. Woh jab tak aap GST verification karaoge nahi tab tak sir open nahi hoga.
Customer: Theek hai, ek kaam karo hum log ka hamara add jo hai na account band kar do, jo hamara payment hai na wapas karwa dijiye aap, theek hai?
Executive: Sir account wagera hum nahi band kar sakte na sir payment hum aapko return kar sakte.
Customer: Kyun nahi band kar sakte? Na aap mera account run kar sakte, na band kar sakte toh phir kya kar sakte ho?
Executive: Sir aap GST verification kyun nahi kara sakte?
Customer: Nahi karwayenge hum GST verification, aur batao.
Customer: Hamara account band kar do aap.
Executive: GST verification ke hum apne, hum apne jo hai platform pe unverified seller ko kaise rakh le aap batao.
Customer: Abhi tak toh itne dino se, aap aaj aap aaye ho na, pichle do-teen saal se toh hum log.
Executive: Abhi tak bhi nahi tha.
Customer: Abhi tak bhi nahi tha sir, main pichle do mahine se aapko continuous call kar raha hun is cheez ke liye.
Customer: Ab jab block ho gaya toh aap sir us cheez ke liye kar rahe ho, pehle se bol raha tha toh sir aap nahi kar rahe the.
Executive: Sir isse pehle, sir ek minute ka kaam hai, ek minute ka kaam hai sir.
Customer: Are nahi, nahi hoga phir, nahi hoga, aage bolo. Nahi hoga, aap, aap usko band, aapko tum bata diya gaya hai ki bhai problem hai GST mein, number change karwaya ja raha hai, accountant jo hai woh hai nahi out of India, kaha se ho payega aap batao aap kar doge?
Executive: Sir aapke kehne se thodi ho jayega aap yeh batao, aapke kehne se thodi ho jayega.
Customer: Aapke kehne se ho jayega, matlab aap sab aap hi ke kehne se ho jayega, mere kehne se toh aapke kehne se ho jayega.
Executive: Sir jo process ka part hai hum usko change nahi kar sakte na aapke kehne se.
Customer: Mere kehne se nahi hoga? Mere kehne se nahi hoga toh aapke kehne se hoga, aap batao mere ko.
Customer: Account close kar do.

Executive: Sir dobara aapko apna lead bechne nahi aana hai, aana hai?
Customer: 3 mahine baad phir aane wale ho, 10 baar 75 baar phone karne wale ho ki sir yeh karwa lo, woh karwa lo, woh karwa lo.
Executive: Sorry sir hum karwa nahi sakte, aap GST verification karwa lijiye tab aap account open kar paoge sir.
Customer: Aap mera account finally close kariye, kya tha? Sir jo abhi main aapka account nahi close kar sakte sir.
Customer: Kyun nahi close kar sakte? Na tum close kar sakte ho, na run kar sakte ho, tum kaahe ke liye baithe ho phir, kaahe ke account manager ho? Main aapko service dene, main aapko service dene ke liye baitha hun sir.
Customer: Aur yeh saari cheeze aapke, aapki taraf se saari, kya de rahe ho? Yeh saari cheeze mere ko batao.
Executive: Service kya de rahe ho batao mere ko.
Customer: Aap apni taraf se saari cheeze sahi kijiye na sir.
Customer: Toh nahi nahi aapke, aapke hisab se sahi karo na aap, mere hisab se sab galat ho raha hai, aapke hisab se sahi karo aap. Aap kya service de rahe ho mere ko?
Customer: Hamara payment ke time se aapne kya service diya batao mere ko.
Customer: Koi muh utha kar ke tumhare paas complaint kar dega, uski complaint tumko sahi lagegi, hum log ka jo uska yeh hai woh aapko sahi nahi lagega?
Executive: Sir dekhiye yeh hamare hath mein hai nahi bilkul bhi. Theek hai, hum aapke liye ek kaafi lamba mail threat chala hai sir department mein. Suno jis department mein kya chala hai ki nahi chala hai, jo kiya hai aap tum karo mera account band karo. Kal ab hamare, kal hamare manager sir aa jayenge. Mera account. Kal hamare manager sir aa jayenge, aap unse baat cheet kijiyega sir.
Customer: Kaun se manager, Sanay aa jayenge? Sanay, Sanay Prakash? Sanay aa jayenge? Sanay, Sanay se baat hui hai hamari. Kya Sanay ne kya kaha aapko? Unhone kya kaha aapko?
Customer: Unhone kya kaha? Unhone se baat kar lo na kya kaha, tumko bata dega woh kya kaha unhone.
Executive: Woh sir aaj office aaye nahi hai, ab kal morning mein aayenge toh woh batayenge.
Customer: Kal morning mein aaye, parso morning mein aaye, woh kya batayega mere ko? Aap ek kaam karo add band kar do ya isko chalu kar do, baat do do mein se ek karo aap log.
Executive: Sorry sir woh aapke kehne se abhi woh cheeze nahi kar sakte hum.
Customer: Aap ticket raise, pehle usko aap ticket resolve karwao. Pehle aapka ticket tabhi close hoga jab aap GST verification kara lenge sir, 50 baar ek hi cheez main nahi bolunga aapko.
Customer: Main sir, Sanay sir bhi yahi, mere Sanay sir bhi, Sanay sir bhi yahi keh rahe hain aapko, main bhi keh raha hun lekin aap samajhne ke liye ready hi nahi hai sir. Process ka part hai, mere karne se kuch hoga nahi sir.
Customer: Abhi tak, Sanay woh hai abhi join kiye ho kya? Sir main, main, main do mahine se, main continuous do mahine se aapko woh cheez keh raha hun ki aap usko kara lijiye, kara lijiye.
Customer: Aur kya sir, do se do mahine se tum keh rahe ho aap mere ko. Abhi toh abhi abhi toh Diwali se pehle Abhishek ho gaya tha, abhi tum aate do mahine se kehne lage, Diwali toh hum se hue gaye hue.
Customer: Mere ko ulti seedhi sikhaate ho aap log. Main aapke account pe kaafi time se, aapke account pe kaafi time se yeh baat cheet chal rahi hai, theek hai? Us cheez ke liye ki GST verification kara lijiye, jab se main aaun tab se toh keh raha hun na sir aapko. Aur yeh cheez maine aapko pehle hi bataya tha sir ki kara lijiye, kara lijiye nahi toh band ho jayega. Hum unverified, hum, hum karaana hai bhai. Tum log, tumko block apne end se kar rakhe ho, account bhi hum log ka separate hai. Sir baat suniye, government ki taraf, government ki taraf se hame authority nahi hai ki hum unready, unverified GST wale sellers ko apne platform pe jo hai usko chala sake. Theek hai?
Customer: Unverified.
Executive: Is cheez ke liye sir shama kijiye. Uske liye, yeh jo hai aap, mere account band kar do na aap log, kyun nahi band kar rahe ho, band karo tum log account. Ab sir kal Sanay sir aa jayenge, aap unse baat cheet kijiyega.
Executive: Theek hai, feedback toh sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants account and services to be closed.

- Wants refund of the payment.

- Complains about poor service and lack of resolution.



Resolution:

- Executive stated account closure is not possible.

- Executive mentioned GST verification is mandatory.

- Executive informed manager will call next day.



Next Steps: 

- Manager will call the customer next day.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Annoyed



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, gst verification, account closure, unverified seller
